name: Candy From Hell
description:
This spooky platformer will get you in the Halloween spirit in no time. When an unsuspecting kid gets his Halloween treats stolen, he does what any red-blooded American would do, pulls out his guns and goes to work. Unbeknownst to him, there may be a little more at stake than just his sugary treats. Come along on this adventure and run, jump, shoot, and explode your way into the true meaning of All Hallow's Eve... 

 Credits:

  • Adam Gobble -Project Manager, Lead Programmer, Music Arranger 
  •  Alanis Baker - Lead Artist 
  •  Daniel Lyon - Programmer, Game Developer
  •  Kenny Rosillo - Game Design 
  • Garret. M. Campell - Game Design

 ---------------------------------------------------------- 

  • jellocube - Environment artist 
  •  Trumpetguy1.0 (Thijmen) - Composer -https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ5puY_5lOTDKl6EAPeTuFg
